org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 DataBlockEncodingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.DataBlockEncodingTool

  • public class DataBlockEncodingTool
extends Object
    Tests various algorithms for key compression on an existing HFile. Useful for testing, debugging and benchmarking.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DataBlockEncodingTool(String compressionAlgorithmName)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DataBlockEncodingTool

        public DataBlockEncodingTool(String compressionAlgorithmName)
        参数:
        compressionAlgorithmName - What kind of algorithm should be used as baseline for comparison (e.g. lzo, gz).

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkStatistics

        public void checkStatistics(KeyValueScanner scanner,
                            int kvLimit)
                     throws IOException
        Check statistics for given HFile for different data block encoders.
        参数:
        scanner - Of file which will be compressed.
        kvLimit - Maximal count of KeyValue which will be processed.
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if scanner is invalid

      • verifyCodecs

        public boolean verifyCodecs(KeyValueScanner scanner,
                            int kvLimit)
                     throws IOException
        Verify if all data block encoders are working properly.
        参数:
        scanner - Of file which was compressed.
        kvLimit - Maximal count of KeyValue which will be processed.
        返回:
        true if all data block encoders compressed/decompressed correctly.
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if scanner is invalid

      • benchmarkCodecs

        public void benchmarkCodecs()
                     throws IOException
        Benchmark codec's speed.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • benchmarkAlgorithm

        public void benchmarkAlgorithm(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress.Compression.Algorithm algorithm,
                               String name,
                               byte[] buffer,
                               int offset,
                               int length)
                        throws IOException
        Check decompress performance of a given algorithm and print it.
        参数:
        algorithm - Compression algorithm.
        name - Name of algorithm.
        buffer - Buffer to be compressed.
        offset - Position of the beginning of the data.
        length - Length of data in buffer.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • displayStatistics

        public void displayStatistics()
                       throws IOException
        Display statistics of different compression algorithms.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • testCodecs

        public static void testCodecs(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                              int kvLimit,
                              String hfilePath,
                              String compressionName,
                              boolean doBenchmark,
                              boolean doVerify)
                       throws IOException
        Test a data block encoder on the given HFile. Output results to console.
        参数:
        kvLimit - The limit of KeyValue which will be analyzed.
        hfilePath - an HFile path on the file system.
        compressionName - Compression algorithm used for comparison.
        doBenchmark - Run performance benchmarks.
        doVerify - Verify correctness.
        抛出:
        IOException - When pathName is incorrect.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        A command line interface to benchmarks. Parses command-line arguments and runs the appropriate benchmarks.
        参数:
        args - Should have length at least 1 and holds the file path to HFile.
        抛出:
        IOException - If you specified the wrong file.
